name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Developer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance web applications focusing on **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **CSS**. Proficient in creating secure, scalable interfaces using modern frameworks and libraries, with a solid understanding of micro frontends and web components. Adept at implementing unit testing frameworks to ensure high-quality code and seamless user experiences. Skilled in infrastructure-as-code practices using **Pulumi** and **Terraform**, alongside CI/CD pipelines managed through **Azure DevOps** to streamline deployment processes.
Possesses a proactive mindset and strong problem-solving abilities that drive efficiency in project execution. Demonstrates excellent communication skills, facilitating collaboration with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals. Committed to developing applications that comply with industry standards and enhance user engagement.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed and optimized scalable web applications using **TypeScript**, **React (17–18)**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and markup languages like **HTML** and **CSS**, adhering to modern frontend practices and security standards for end-users.
•	Led initiatives on micro frontends and web components to enhance application modularity and performance, ensuring high-quality user experiences and efficient application delivery.
•	Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **Azure DevOps** and **Terraform** for automating deployments, reducing downtime by over **30%** through consistent infrastructure management practices.
•	Conducted unit testing across applications using **unit testing frameworks**, achieving over **90%** test coverage for both frontend and backend services, and enhancing reliability and maintainability.
•	Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, demonstrating excellent communication skills and proactive problem-solving to meet project deadlines and improve workflows.
•	Ensured web page security through comprehensive strategies on **Azure portal security**, aligning with best practices to safeguard user data and maintain compliance.
•	Engineered responsive, high-performance user interfaces that interact seamlessly with back-end services, optimizing loading times by **20%** through efficient coding practices and performance monitoring.
•	Utilized modern development tools including **NPM** for package management and version control to streamline development processes and enhance collaborative efforts.
•	Engaged in regular code reviews and mentorship, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and skill development among junior team members with a focus on innovative frontend solutions.

- Developed dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **TypeScript**, **React (18)**, **Next.js**, and **CSS**, ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness.
- Implemented unit testing frameworks to enhance the reliability of the applications, achieving a code coverage of **90%**.
- Collaborated on migrating the architecture to a microservices-based approach using **Node.js** and **Azure DevOps**, increasing deployment frequency by **50%**.
- Applied best practices in **web components** and **micro frontends** to streamline and modularize the development process.
- Ensured compliance with **web page security** standards and implemented **infrastructure-as-code** practices using **Terraform** and **Pulumi** for smooth deployments and better resource management.
- Actively participated in **CI/CD pipelines** setup, reducing the lead time for changes and enhancing integration workflows by **40%**.
- Provided mentorship and training to junior developers, improving team communication and problem-solving skills, fostering a collaborative environment.
- Demonstrated a proactive mindset in addressing challenges, contributing innovative solutions during project development to enhance overall product offerings.

Utilized **TypeScript** and **React (18)** to architect and develop highly interactive frontend applications, improving user engagement and achieving a **30%** increase in page load performance.
Implemented **Next.js** for improved server-side rendering, optimizing SEO capabilities, and enhancing accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1) for a modern e-commerce platform.
Employed **HTML5/CSS3** alongside advanced **CSS frameworks** for responsive, mobile-first design, resulting in a **25%** reduction in bounce rates on mobile devices.
Integrated **Node.js** microservices architecture to facilitate efficient communication between frontend and backend systems, delivering features in real-time with reduced latency by **15%** across crucial user workflows.
Leveraged **CI/CD pipelines** utilizing **Azure DevOps** for streamlined deployment and version control, enhancing deployment speed by **40%**.
Created reusable **web components** and implemented **micro frontends** to increase code maintainability and enhance team collaboration.
Applied **unit testing frameworks** to ensure a consistent quality and reliability of code, helping maintain a <1% bug rate post-release.
Engaged in proactive problem-solving and communication to address cross-team dependencies and deliver feature requirements on time.
Utilized **infrastructure-as-code** strategies with **Terraform** and **Pulumi** to automate environment provisioning and enhance security protocols in the **Azure Portal** and ensure tight **web page security**.
Maintained high standards of user experience and functionality by regularly monitoring and updating **NPM** dependencies as part of the development cycle.
